thread.title: Joelle Mooradian
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Joelle Mooradian

author: Joelle Mooradian
title: Joelle Mooradian
text: I recently purchased 3 books (part of a big a series my son is collecting) and they were marked as "almost brand new" and "like new" all 3 were marked WITH their dust covers (2 of which did not) but when I recieved the books they had "puppy dog ears" Bend up bindings etc. Def NOT even close to "like new". Long story short, I wrote the company, They offered a refund which I never got! Poor Poor customer service. i wont be ordering from them again. Sad too because I had gotten a few good books from them in the past but they have just gone down hill lately.
